properties.areaDesc: Bighorn Mountains Southeast; Bighorn Mountains West
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 17 at 4:56AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This is a special weather statement from the National Weather
Service Office in Riverton.

* WHAT...Periods of snow. New Snowfall of 1 to 3 inches with
locally higher amounts possible in the northern portion of the
range. Brief moderate to heavy snow is possible with visibility
reduced to around a half mile.

* WHERE...Bighorn Mountains.

* WHEN...Today.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roads leading into the mountains will be
slick to snow covered. The morning and evening commute will be
impacted by winter weather.

NWSheadline: Snow Today across the Bighorn Mountains
